customize_your_trip: We create the Trip you love
custom_trip_description: We create the trip you love. We are here to help you plan your perfect trip to Albania. Whether you're looking for a relaxing beach vacation, an adventurous hiking trip, or a cultural exploration of our rich history, we can customize a tour that suits your needs and preferences.
search_no_results_suggestions: Try searching for something else or check your spelling.
app_title: Daily Trip Albania - Tours & Adventures in Albania
app_slogan: Come as a tourist, leave as a true Albanian.
app_description: Daily Trip Albania offers tours and adventures in Albania. We are dedicated to providing you with an unforgettable and unique experience during your stay in Albania. Explore the natural beauty, culture, and history of our country with us.
app_keywords: Tours, adventures, Albania, Daily Trip Albania, tourism, travel, nature, culture, history
